General.Name: Lg Electronics Pref
General.Description: LG Electronics Inc., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells consumer and commercial products worldwide. It operates through Home Appliance & Air Solution, Home Entertainment, Vehicle Component Solutions, Business Solutions, Innotek, and Other segments. The company offers refrigerators, washing machines, vacuum cleaners, air conditioners, air and water purifiers, microwave ovens, dish washers, and stylers. It also provides digital, OLED, and LED signages, as well as commercial TV's for corporate, education, hospitality and healthcare, luxury home, retail and QSR, and transportation industries; audio products; HVAC products; commercial, residential, and industrial ESS products; commercial laundry products, including washer and dryer; compressor and motors; and robot products. In addition, the company offers monitors, PCs, information displays, projectors, computer accessories, laptops, medical displays, and cloud devices; cockpit electronics, connectivity products, and automotive vision systems; and solar panels. Further, it provides camera modules, substrate and materials, motor/sensors, and other products; and support services. It sells its products under the LG brand name. The company was formerly known as GoldStar and changed its name to LG Electronics Inc. in 1995. LG Electronics Inc. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: LG Twin Tower 128, Seoul, South Korea, 07336
